summary: The video discusses the trend of using retinol in skincare products, particularly its perceived benefits in combating aging. It references Google Trends data showing increased interest in retinol in Ukraine since 2021. The speaker mentions a popular brand that claims retinol is one of the best ingredients for anti-aging, but questions its effectiveness in reversing aging signs like sagging skin. The speaker suggests that while retinol may make the skin look smoother, it does not address the underlying causes of aging. The video includes discussions on the expectations of retinol and its actual effects.
keywords: retinol, anti-aging, Google Trends, skincare, aging, cosmetics, beauty products
